mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (user_id, title, category, description, price, trade_type, delivery_point_id, longitude, latitude, location_address, images, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{category}, #{description}, #{price}, #{tradeType}, #{deliveryPointId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{locationAddress}, #{images}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
